title: "Madam Secretary" The Middle Way (TV Episode 2016)
description: Directed by James Whitmore Jr..  With TÃ©a Leoni, Tim Daly, Keith Carradine, Patina Miller. Elizabeth heads to Myanmar to finalize an important trade agreement.
